name: RLGL Arena - Local Multiplayer
description:
RLGL Arena is a local multiplayer game where you can play the popular "Red Light, Green Light" round from Squid Game, up to 5 players!

After choosing the number of players, from 1 to 5, you will need to pay attention to the keyboard on which you have to press in order to run. Each player will have a unique keyboard, and, if you are on mobile, you will have a unique spot on the screen to press.

As in the original series, in order to survive, you need to stop when the doll is turned around and sing. Run as fast as you can, because if the timer will hit 0 seconds and you are still on the battlefield, you will die.

After each round, you will have a podium where you will get points.

With the points, you can buy access to the GYM in order to make your character run faster.

You can play the game on any device, laptop, PC, smartphone, and any operation system, Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, iOS, and so on.
